title: Newly renovated 3 bed 2 bath home 98168
app_fee: $28 message me for link to apply
posting_body: Completely updated home in the perfect location!
Minutes from Sea-tac Airport, Downtown Seattle or Renton, Tukwila Light Rail Station, Southcenter mall, Boeing field, and all major highways!
There is even a bus stop a few steps away!
Updated bathrooms and kitchens, freshly painted inside and out.
New floors, stainless steel appliances, new windows, and new plumbing and roof.
Property management is on-site for any issues or repairs.
The renter is responsible for all utilities.
First-month rent and security deposit are due before the start of the lease.
The tenant will be required to go through a background and credit check at no cost to the landlord.
Landlord will not accept a comprehensive reusable tenant screening report.
